Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes GenAI misses the mark with its feedback (lacks context), however feedback improves with feedback from myself.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feels less threatening and judgemental coming from GenAI as its only a machine. Feel judged sometimes when you're getting feedback from your teacher, like was that a silly question to ask whereas you can ask GenAI all sorts of questions.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is good at explaining concepts for different levels, good at simplifying things. Often I will ask GenAI to explain a difficult concept to me as if I was in Grade 10 !
